channel.title: Comments on: Virtualization, GlusterFS, and automation

item.title: By: Unattended Ubuntu VM installation with preseed » Flying Bug
item.dc:creator: Unattended Ubuntu VM installation with preseed » Flying Bug
item.description: […] This article discussed how to install CentOS VM automatically with kickstart. I tried to do similar thing for Ubuntu as well but failed so many times. It seems kickstart works with RedHat families pretty well which makes perfect sense, while Ubuntu does not like that way too much. […]
item.content:encoded: […] This article discussed how to install CentOS VM automatically with kickstart. I tried to do similar thing for Ubuntu as well but failed so many times. It seems kickstart works with RedHat families pretty well which makes perfect sense, while Ubuntu does not like that way too much. […]
